label: Fu-Ming, Shi & Bian Xun.  2013. One new genus and species of the tribe Meconematini (Orthoptera, Tettigoniidae) from Sichuan, China with description of the male sex and transfer of Acosmetura carinata Liu, Zhou & Bi, 2008 to the new genus. Zootaxa 3599(4): 390–394.
